content.description:
<math alttext="N 2, gas" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math> reacts with <math alttext="F 2, gas" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math> in a sealed, rigid container to produce <math alttext="N F 3, gas" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>NF</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math> according to the following balanced equation.

<math alttext="N 2, gas, plus 3 F 2, gas, react to produce 2 N F 3, gas" overflow="scroll"> <msub> <mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msub> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>g</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>+</mo> <mn>3</mn> <mspace width="0.25em"> </mspace> <msub> <mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msub> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>g</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>â†’</mo> <mn>2</mn> <mspace width="0.25em"> </mspace> <msub> <mi>NF</mi> <mn>3</mn> </msub> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>g</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </math>

The <math alttext="N 2, gas" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math> had an initial partial pressure of <math alttext="1.00 atmosphere" overflow="scroll"><mn>1.00</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>atm</mi></math>, and the <math alttext="F 2, gas" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math> had an initial partial pressure of <math alttext="1.80 atmospheres" overflow="scroll"> <mn>1.80</mn> <mspace width="0.2em"> </mspace> <mi>atm</mi> </math>.
content.question: Assuming that the reaction goes to completion and the temperature remains constant, what is the maximum partial pressure of <math alttext="N F 3, gas" overflow="scroll"> <msub> <mi>NF</mi> <mn>3</mn> </msub> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>g</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </math> that could be produced?

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
